title: Stunning 3bd/2.5ba w/ private roof deck, central AC & laundry in unit
posting_body: Welcome to this beautiful, condo quality, 3 bedroom 2.5 bathroom DUPLEX unit with private roof deck and sweeping views!!
Apartment is just under 1,600 SF and features a stunning layout.
Master bedroom includes en-suite bathroom and HUGE WALK IN closet.
Perfect for roommates or a couple that needs to work from home and needs to have a guest room and home office.
Open kitchen and living room layout.
The kitchen features modern cabinetry and stainless steal appliances.
Central air-conditioning, forced hot air and hardwood floors throughout complete this rare offering.
Just 2 stops on the newly renovated blue line to Aquarium, 3 stops to State Street.
Also just an ten minute walk to the Maverick T stop.
Grocery, shopping, gyms/yoga studio and restaurants all within a few blocks from your front door.
